name: Iann Dior
description: '''Michael Ian Olmo''' (born March 25, 1999), known professionally as '''Iann Dior''' (stylized in [[all lowercase]]), is an American rapper. He is best known for his guest appearance on [[24kGoldn]]'s 2020 single "[[Mood (24kGoldn song)|Mood]]", which peaked atop the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]] and remains his sole entry on the chart. He signed to [[Internet Money Records]] and [[10K Projects]] prior to the release of his debut album, ''Industry Plant'' (2019), which was followed by ''[[On to Better Things]]'' (2022)â€”both of which entered the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]].
